title: At Least 1,000 Killed in Afghanistan Earthquake, Officials Say
content:
1. At Least 1,000 Killed in Afghanistan Earthquake, Officials Say  The New York Times
  2. Deadly earthquake hits Afghanistan: Live updates  CNN
  3. Afghanistan magnitude 5.9 earthquake kills at least 1000 people | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  4. Afghan earthquake: At least 1000 people killed and 1500 injured  BBC
  5. U.S. not aware of assistance request from Taliban after quake, expects talks ahead  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
